db:abstract.db:para: Modify however you like, just cred me for my work, maybe link to my page.

db:article.db:para: High res environment map (converted to webgl).
Used in the anaglyph-rendering example and autotests of Qt 3D.
The sources can be found in qt3d/tests/manual/exampleresources/assets/cubemaps/miramar.
Modify however you like, just cred me for my work, maybe link to my page..

THIS SKY WAS UPDATED AT THE 27TH THE ORIG HAD SOME ERRORS
MIRAMAR high res 1024^2 environment map ships as TGA.
By Jockum Skoglund aka hipshot hipshot@zfight.com www.zfight.com Stockholm, 2005 08 25
